column4: how do I check what USB units are connected and recognized by Ubuntu? i'm starting to doubt this dongle is even powered up

[00:36] <Ose> can anyone help me get my comp online? I have an USB wifi dongle that did work, until the network changed. I got help with getting it on last time, but because of the new encryption settings I can't do it again on my own

if your network "changed" then you have to figure out what those changes are, like for example if it's secured then you have to change the password, we cant figure it out unless we know what those changes are
if the router was reset then most likely the password was changed, that's the first possibililty
